definition: grain that has begun to ripen/variant of 衹|只[zhi3]
classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc

sentences.english: A Confederate boat carried Fox to Sumter.
sentences.chinese: 一艘邦联的船只将福克斯运送到萨姆特堡。

sentences.english: The practice of YueFang ships seriously threatened the life safety of Chinese fishermen.
sentences.chinese: 越方船只的做法严重威胁了中国渔民的生命安全。

sentences.english: The Australian government has indicated that a prosecution will follow because the ship ran aground in a no-go zone.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚政府提出起诉因为船只驶入了禁止区域。

sentences.english: In order to get next to a dock, a vessel had to turn its rudder to the outside.
sentences.chinese: 为了靠上码头，船只必须将船舵转向外侧。

sentences.english: A gun like this would also be useful for stopping pirate attacks against commercial shipping.
sentences.chinese: 像这样的电磁炮同样也可用于阻止海盗袭击商用船只。

sentences.english: The age of the carrying vessel chartered by the Seller shall not
sentences.chinese: 卖方所租载货船只船龄不得超过15年。

sentences.english: The inside and outside of the vessel were smoothed and red ochre slip was applied.
sentences.chinese: 内部和外部的船只进行平滑和红色赭石采用滑动。

sentences.english: Many boats have run aground on the sandbar at the river mouth.
sentences.chinese: 许多船只在河口的沙堤搁浅。

sentences.english: Over the past few months, U. S. and Chinese ships have had several run-ins.
sentences.chinese: 过去几个月来，美国和中国的船只发生了数次摩擦。

sentences.english: Drought has caused major problems for boats that use the Xiangjiang River in Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 干旱给通过湖南省湘江河的船只带来严重的问题。

sentences.english: That rock is a hazard to ships.
sentences.chinese: 那块岩石对船只构成威胁。

sentences.english: And ships can reach the Atlantic Ocean from the Great Lakes through the Saint Lawrence Seaway.
sentences.chinese: 而船只则能够从五大湖经过圣劳伦斯航道到达大西洋。

sentences.english: The hijacking of the Alabama is believed the first pirate attack on an American-flagged merchant ship in 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉巴马被看做200年来第一艘被劫的美国船只。

sentences.english: Ships raced along on the river.
That day was hastened when the sea-brigands of Somalia caught Chinese vessels, cargoes and sailors in the net of their brazen raids.
sentences.chinese: 当索马里海盗绑架中国船只，那一天加速到来。

sentences.english: The wakes of several ships are visible in the surrounding waters.
sentences.chinese: 在周围的水域可以看到不少出航的船只。

definition: (of a boat) to reach the shore/to pull toward shore/close to shore/landfall
